Name: Besthe
Notes: The strongest member of the Lion Guard and one of Kion 's friends

Name: Dumbo
Notes: An elephant with big ears , and he can fly , which happens towards the end of the film

Name: Elephanchine
Notes: A ballet dancing obese elephant who leads other dancing elephants and gets a bubble stuck on her foot

Name: Ellie
Notes: At first thinks she 's a possum , until Manny convinced her that she 's just like him ; a mammoth . Is Peaches ' mother and Manny 's wife . Is more openhearted to Peaches than Manny is when her only daughter becomes an adolescent . voiced by Queen Latifah

Name: Elly
Notes: A female pink elephant who always wears a blue backpack . She loves making biscuits and tea , and has a doll that she loves very much . Despite her size , she is graceful and gentle , capable of ballet dancing . She is , however , very bossy and generally does things her way . She usually rides around on her pink scooter

Name: Elmer Elephant
Notes: Disney cartoon short . ( Not to be confused with Elmer the Patchwork Elephant )

Name: Ethan
Notes: A teenage mammoth on whom Peaches has a crush

Name: Flavio and Marita
Notes: Known as the Hip Hippos , a wealthy , Spanish hippo couple obsessed with being trendy . Sometimes they have been in dangerous situations , but usually remain unaware of it and rarely suffer harm , mainly due to their large frames

Name: Fingertip
Notes: An Asian elephant calf who first appeared in Elephant Brains ! . Martin named her that because of her one trunk finger . She than helped the wild kratts crew free her herd from Paisley Paver

Name: Gazpacho
Notes: A mammoth who works at a market

Name: Golias
Notes: A large , round , blue elephant who is Yuri 's Big Big Friend

Name: Goliath II
Notes: A very small elephant who has trouble fitting in with the herd
